E.comment: The type of entity that the Brain represents.

memoryTypes.comment: The memory types that the Brain will have.

sensorTypes.comment: The sensor types that the Brain will have.

codec.comment: The codec that will be used to serialize and deserialize the Brain.

constructors.comment: Creates a new @({this}) with the given memory and sensor types.

params.name: dynamic
params.comment: The dynamic that contains the serialized Brain.

makeBrain.comment: Creates a new @({pkg}.Brain) with the given memory and sensor types.
